articles.title: Kenya : Haiti Demands a New International Force and Reparations From France
articles.summary: 'This is the face of Haiti today: a country at war, a modern-day Guernica, a human tragedy.' From the podium of the UN General Assembly, Haiti's transitional leader delivered a stark plea to the international community. At the heart of his speech was the urgency of breaking free from spiralling violence, alongside a call to close what he described as two centuries of historical injustice. Laurent Saint-Cyr painted a bleak picture: murders, gang r
